main event: An observer driving in Kloten, North Dakota, noticed various objects in the sky that appeared to burst and turn yellow before disappearing, possibly fireworks or flares.
interesting points: The observer reported the objects bursting within 2 to 5 seconds,The surrounding area lit up during the observation,Objects were seen appearing and disappearing quickly,The sighting occurred at night while the observer was driving along highway #15,The observer is a civilian employee from Northwood Hospital and wishes to remain anonymous.
sighted object: multiple objects that burst in the sky
witness description: civilian employee of Northwood Hospital, Northwood, N. Dak.
